attributes.action: Make it the law to go green
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The world is being destroyed by the way everyone lives their lives.
Some people are just ignoring this knowing that there kids will be left to face the problem we have caused.
It should be a law so people don't have a choice, so they HAVE to do everything they can to save the earth.
Some people really don't know how serious it is.
